topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Disabling and Enabling Users

body.p: Users can be disabled in the domain. After you disable a user, the user account remains in the domain, but cannot be used to log in.
As an admin, you can disable and enable users, as needed.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Users panel.

In the Users table, for the user you want to deleite, click Edit User then Disable User.
The user is disabled and cannot be used to log in.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Identity dashboard, then the Users panel.

In the Users table, for the user you want to deleite, click Edit User then Enable User.
The user is enabled and can be used to log in.
